content: ribbed for your warmth by sonia ruyts materials approximately 100 yards worsted weight yarn us size 8 16-inch circular needles or size needed to get a cozy gauge 1 stitch marker tapestry needle abbreviations k knit p purl directions cast on 120 stitches join stitches to knit in the round placing a marker to indicate the beginning of the round *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round repeat for a total of 10 row in pattern *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of round repeat for a total of 10 row in pattern repeat these 2 instructions once more for a total of 40 row and bind off loosely use tapestry needle to weave in ends notes if you want your cowl to be a little larger repeat pattern until desired length i made mine with 50 row and it is long enough to tuck into your coat and still have plenty of warmth around the neck to adjust the circumference simply add or subtract the number of cast on stitches in multiples of 4  sonia ruyts 2008
